Arrangement.text:
Chorus: [C2] Hands [G]up hearts [Em7]open [Dsus]wide as the [C2]sky We [G]lift You high[Em7], we [Dsus]lift You high [C2] Hands [G]up hearts [Em7]open [Dsus]wide as we [C2]cry [G] God we [Em7]lift Your name [Dsus]high
Verse: [C2] Let all the other names[Em7] fade a[D]way [G/B] [C2] Let all the other names[Em7] fade a[D]way Until thereâ€™s [G/B]only [C2]You Let all the other names [Em7]fade [D]away Jesus, [G/B]take Your [C2]place Jesus, [Em7]take [D]Your place [G]
Bridge: Our God [C2]we [G]lift You high [Em7]we [Dsus]lift You high [C2]Hands u[G]p God we li[Em7]Your name [Dsus]high Our God [C2]we [G]lift You high [Em7]we [Dsus]lift You high [C2]Hands u[G]p God we li[Em7]Your name [Dsus]high
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus hands up hearts open wide as the sky we lift you high we lift you high hands up hearts open wide as we cry god we lift your name high verse let all the other names fade away let all the other names fade away until theres only you let all the other names fade away jesus take your place jesus take your place bridge our god we lift you high we lift you high hands up god we liyour name high our god we lift you high we lift you high hands up god we liyour name high
